inpasuwa balaporoththu athhara nogath edi rapawahini wadasatahan niwedakayeku hamu una.ema niwedakaya elisabeth ge athurudahanwima pilibandawa wada satahanak kala ayek.ohu meri kiyapu aluth wistharath samaga emmanuwel ge ru satahanakda prasiddha kala.me wadasatahana nawatha nawathath pracharaya wana wita derik namaththeku emmanuwel wa handunaganna samath una.emmanuwel nam wu pudgalaya derik ge mawa samaga kalakata ihatha di "michel"yana naminwiwaha wi siti ayek.michel ee wana wita wiwaha 03k karagath ayek.amuthuma aakaraye aagamak adahamin shanthuwarayeku lesa peni siti michel ge aramuna wuye wiwahayan 49k karaganimin ohu adahu dewiyan wahanse ge kamaththa itu kirimayi.
